info.name: Not Safe For Humanity (Revised)
info.description:
My very first generic deck, made with members of the Ars Against Humanity G+ group. Revised edition, now with 20 less cards and all spelling/grammar errors fixed (no more 'shreads' of dignity).

Update 2015-03-22: Removed the white card 'Teaching the bitch a lesson'. Nothing of value was lost.
